attributes.action: change the right to buy on council or state owned property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the right to buy your council house should be restricted to british nationals after occupying the property for a period of no less than ten years.
stop the loophole of immigrants coming into the uk, being given social housing that they can then purchase after only three years and make a fortune on our property market.also stop the loophole that allows property developers to buy council housing stock for modernisation and resale. Any purchase of council house stock by any individual employed by the council and who may be in a position to affect price or any other aspect of a sale should be under tight scrutiny or investigation.
